name.baseName: 香料|碱类、酸类、醇类、醚类等①|化学或生物合成、物理分离工艺|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及通过化学或生物方法以及物理过程合成和分离各种与香料有关的化学品，例如碱、酸、醇和醚。该过程适用于所有规模的生产。此外，该过程详细说明了用于污染控制的末端处理技术。处理的污染物包括废水、化学需氧量、氨氮、与石油相关的废物、有机结合的氮和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）。概述了各种处理方法，如物理、化学、好氧生物处理、活性炭吸附和蒸汽脱附，及其各自的技术效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2684文件，在完整版文件中第3009页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为香料，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是活性炭吸附，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=1.0，①由于生产不同香料产品使用的原料各不相同且原料品种繁多，系数表单中仅列举了几类常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附+蒸汽解析，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=1.0，①由于生产不同香料产品使用的原料各不相同且原料品种繁多，系数表单中仅列举了几类常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical + chemical + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours).The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 4116×L。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 4116×L. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理+化学+好氧生物处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（污水处理设施的所有耗电设备额定功率（千瓦）×污水处理设施年运行时间（小时/年）），①由于生产不同香料产品使用的原料各不相同且原料品种繁多，系数表单中仅列举了几类常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮原文描述的产污系数为 4116×L。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management84，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours).The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 4116×L。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 4116×L. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理+化学处理法，其效率为84，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（污水处理设施的所有耗电设备额定功率（千瓦）×污水处理设施年运行时间（小时/年）），①由于生产不同香料产品使用的原料各不相同且原料品种繁多，系数表单中仅列举了几类常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮原文描述的产污系数为 4116×L。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
